item.source: How do i make an ip for my server?

item.title: How do i make an ip for my server?
item.dc:creator: @ricky_james ricky james
item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

[quote=“tobias222, post:5, topic:116485”]There is an easier way to making an ip than you think. I hope you appreciate this because I have put a lot of effort into it.
STEP ONE:
go to http://hamachi.cc (please dont use direct link. Search “hamachi” on google" Download the english version for microsoft windows. Then open up the setup file. It is either in one of theese places because they are popular for downloads to be downloaded to:

  1. C:/documents and settings/USER/My downloads - (a folder in my documents called “my downloads”
  2. C:\desktop (your desktop icons
    \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\There is a reason for me using the wrong slash. Dont flame/////////////////////////////////////////
    Now set it up and check the box that prompts: “Create a desktop icon”
    When you are finished STEP ONE you should have a new icon on your desktop called either two things:
    1.Shortcut to hamachi
    2.Hamachi
    !!!~WELL DONE~!!!
    STEP 2:
    Just setup hamachi and pick a nickname. You can change this again by clicking on “preferences”.
    You will see some numbers at the top of hamachi in BOLD , white text. They usually start with a 5 and are seperated with dots…
    That is ur ip xD
    Here are some examples just to check u have the right number:
    .5.132.75.118
    5.118.34.124
    5.674.21.313
    And continues on and on and on… (hopefully you get the picture with 3 examples eh?)

\\\\\\THIS IS ONLY A SHORT GUIDE TO HELP YOU , WAS NOT LEECHED BUT MADE SECONDS AGO BY YOURS TRULY.//////////////[/quote]hey bud what if he doesnt wanna download a viruis named ham…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make an ip for my server?

item.title: How do i make an ip for my server?
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

There is an easier way to making an ip than you think. I hope you appreciate this because I have put a lot of effort into it.
STEP ONE:
go to http://hamachi.cc (please dont use direct link. Search “hamachi” on google" Download the english version for microsoft windows. Then open up the setup file. It is either in one of theese places because they are popular for downloads to be downloaded to:

  1. C:/documents and settings/USER/My downloads - (a folder in my documents called “my downloads”
  2. C:\desktop (your desktop icons
    \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\There is a reason for me using the wrong slash. Dont flame/////////////////////////////////////////
    Now set it up and check the box that prompts: “Create a desktop icon”
    When you are finished STEP ONE you should have a new icon on your desktop called either two things:
    1.Shortcut to hamachi
    2.Hamachi
    !!!~WELL DONE~!!!
    STEP 2:
    Just setup hamachi and pick a nickname. You can change this again by clicking on “preferences”.
    You will see some numbers at the top of hamachi in BOLD , white text. They usually start with a 5 and are seperated with dots…
    That is ur ip xD
    Here are some examples just to check u have the right number:
    .5.132.75.118
    5.118.34.124
    5.674.21.313
    And continues on and on and on… (hopefully you get the picture with 3 examples eh?)

\\\\\\THIS IS ONLY A SHORT GUIDE TO HELP YOU , WAS NOT LEECHED BUT MADE SECONDS AGO BY YOURS TRULY.//////////////
